00021    bool          MpiTraits<DdMd::MaskPolicy>::hasType = true;

00025 
00026 namespace DdMd
00027 {
00028 
00029    using namespace Util;
00030 
00031    /* 
00032    * Extract a MaskPolicy from an istream as a string.
00033    */
00034    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, MaskPolicy& policy)
00035    {
00036       std::string buffer;
00037       in >> buffer;
00038       if (buffer == "MaskNone" || buffer == "maskNone") {
00039          policy = MaskNone;
00040       } else 
00041       if (buffer == "MaskBonded" || buffer == "maskBonded") {
00042          policy = MaskBonded;
00043       } else {
00044          UTIL_THROW("Invalid MaskPolicy string");
00045       } 
00046       return in;
00047    }
00048    
00049    /* 
00050    * Insert a MaskPolicy to an ostream as a string.
00051    */
00052    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, MaskPolicy policy) 
00053    {
00054       if (policy == MaskNone) {
00055          out << "MaskNone";
00056       } else 
00057       if (policy == MaskBonded) {
00058          out << "MaskBonded";
00059       } else {
00060          UTIL_THROW("This should never happen");
00061       } 
00062       return out; 
00063    }
00064 
00065 }
00066 #endif
